events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn’t fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on keywords like refund and request.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket. I'll be happy to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or if you need instructions on how to return it?
Sure, my order number is 458392. I haven’t returned the jacket yet since I didn’t know how to start the process.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label I’m sending you now. Once we receive it, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I really appreciate how easy you’re making this refund process.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount back in your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and everything was satisfactory with the resolution provided.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and please reach out again if you need further assistance.
A satisfaction survey invitation has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their refund experience.
